Class_Skill_Desc_Anatman: Extends the duration of Disciplined Fist and your present form to maximum and halts their expiration.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution. Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm of the Destroyer: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby targets.</br>Opo-opo Form Potency: 110</br>Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bladedance: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bootshine: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Braver: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,400.
Class_Skill_Desc_Brotherhood: Grants Brotherhood and Meditative Brotherhood to self and all nearby party members.</br>Brotherhood Effect: Increases damage dealt by 5%</br>Meditative Brotherhood Effect: 20% chance you open a chakra when party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell</br>Chance is 100% when you successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell while under the effect of Meditative Brotherhood.% chance you open a chakra when you or party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell% chance you open a chakra when you or party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Celestial Revolution: Delivers an attack with a potency of 450.</br>Additional Effect: Opens the Lunar Nadi</br>If the Lunar Nadi is already open, opens the Solar Nadi instead.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form</br>Duration: 30s</br>Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of three Beast Chakra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Demolish: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Combo Action: Twin Snakes</br>Additional Effect: Extends Wind Resonance duration by 5s to a maximum of 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dragon Kick: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>Combo Action: Snap Punch</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Earth's Reply: Deals physical damage to all nearby enemies and restores your HP.</br>Damage Potency: 2,000 plus 25% of compiled damage</br>Cure Potency: 4,000 plus 50% of compiled damage</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Earth Resonance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Elixir Field: Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Opens the Lunar Nadi</br>Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form</br>Duration: 30s</br>Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of three of the same Beast Chakra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enlightenment: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Additional Effect: 15-yalm knockback to first target</br>Also afflicts first target with Pressure Point if successfully knocked back.</br>Pressure Point Effect: Next weaponskill or Meteodrive used on target will deal additional damage with a potency of 8,000</br>Duration: 3s</br>Effect of Pressure Point expires upon dealing additional damage.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Final Heaven: Delivers an attack with a potency of 9,000.
Class_Skill_Desc_Flint Strike: Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Opens the Solar Nadi</br>Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form</br>Duration: 30s</br>Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of three distinct Beast Chakra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Form Shift: Grants Formless Fist to self, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Class_Skill_Desc_Four-point Fury: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.</br>Can only be executed when in raptor form.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Disciplined Fist</br>Disciplined Fist Effect: Increases damage dealt by 15%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Changes form to coeurl</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Howling Fist: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.</br>Shares a recast timer with The Forbidden Chakra/Steel Peak.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mantra: Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10% for self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Masterful Blitz: Strike the enemy with a technique fueled by the power of your Beast Chakra.</br>The technique used is determined by the number of different types of Beast Chakra opened.</br>1 Beast Chakra Type: Elixir Field</br>2 Beast Chakra Types: Celestial Revolution</br>3 Beast Chakra Types: Rising Phoenix/Flint Strike</br>3 Beast Chakra and Both Nadi: Phantom Rush/Tornado Kick
Class_Skill_Desc_Meditation: Opens a chakra. Up to five chakra can be opened at once.</br>Opens all five chakra when used outside of combat.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.</br>※Action changes to The Forbidden Chakra/Steel Peak when all five chakra are open.
Class_Skill_Desc_Meteodrive: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000.</br>Additional Effect: Removes target's Guard</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Meteodrive, rendering them unable to move</br>Duration: 3s</br>If target does not have an active Guard effect, deals additional damage with a potency of 12,000.</br>Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 75s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Perfect Balance: Grants 3 stacks of Perfect Balance, each stack allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Opo-opo Chakra, Coeurl Chakra, or Raptor Chakra depending on the form required by actions executed</br>//Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while in combat and when not under the effect of any Beast Chakra./Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phantom Rush: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Combo Action: Demolish</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Riddle of Earth: Grants Earth Resonance, changing Riddle of Earth to Earth's Reply, and allowing you to compile damage each time you are struck by an enemy.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Executing Earth's Reply deals physical damage to all nearby enemies and restores your HP.</br>Damage Potency: 2,000 plus 25% of compiled damage</br>Cure Potency: 4,000 plus 50% of compiled damage
Class_Skill_Desc_Rising Phoenix: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Fire Resonance</br>Fire Resonance Effect: Increases damage dealt by next weaponskill by 50%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Rockbreaker: Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all nearby enemies.</br>Can only be executed when in coeurl form.</br>Additional Effect: Changes form to opo-opo</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shadow of the Destroyer: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all nearby enemies.</br>Opo-opo Form Bonus: Guarantees a critical hit</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.</br>Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Six-sided Star: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%</br>Duration: 5s
Class_Skill_Desc_Snap Punch: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Combo Action: True Strike</br>Additional Effect: Extends Wind Resonance duration by 5s to a maximum of 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Steel Peak: Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.</br>Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.</br>Shares a recast timer with Howling Fist.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Thunderclap: Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Wind Resonance</br>Wind Resonance Effect: Reduces weaponskill recast time by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>If already under the effect of Wind Resonance, extends duration by 10s to a maximum of 15s.</br>Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around target party member that nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>If the target selected was an enemy, creates a barrier around self instead.</br>Duration: 5s</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Tornado Kick: Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 850 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form</br>Duration: 30s</br>Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Lunar Nadi and Solar Nadi, as well as three Beast Chakra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_True North: Nullifies all action direction requirements.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_True Strike: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Bootshine</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Twin Snakes: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Dragon Kick</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Forbidden Chakra: Delivers an attack with a potency of 340.</br>Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.</br>Shares a recast timer with Enlightenment/Howling Fist.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Status_Desc_Anatman: Form and Disciplined Fist timers are suspended due to a transcendent inner calm.
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodbath: Attacks generate HP equal to the amount of physical damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Demolish: Sustaining damage over time, as well as increased damage from target who executed Demolish.
Class_Status_Desc_Feint: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Feint.
Class_Status_Desc_Mantra: HP recovery via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Meteodrive: Unable to move or execute actions.
Class_Status_Desc_Thunderclap: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Trait_Desc_Arm of the Destroyer Ma: Upgrades Arm of the Destroyer to Shadow of the Destroyer.
Class_Trait_Desc_Deep Meditation: Grants an 80% chance that a chakra will open upon dealing critical damage with a weaponskill.
Class_Trait_Desc_Deep Meditation II: Guarantees that a chakra will open upon dealing critical damage with a weaponskill.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Brotherhood: Guarantees that a chakra will open when you are under the effect of Meditative Brotherhood and execute a weaponskill or cast a spell.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Greased Lightn: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 10%.
Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.
Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%. Also improves Disciplined Fist's damage increase to 15%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Perfect Balanc: When under the effect of Perfect Balance, grants Beast Chakra in accordance with the form normally required to execute weaponskills.</br>Weaponskills requiring opo-opo form grant Opo-opo Chakra.</br>Weaponskills requiring coeurl form grant Coeurl Chakra.</br>Weaponskills requiring raptor form grant Raptor Chakra.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Thunderclap: Allows a third charge of Thunderclap.
Class_Trait_Desc_Flint Strike Mastery: Upgrades Flint Strike to Rising Phoenix.
Class_Trait_Desc_Greased Lightning: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 5%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Bootshine to 210, True Strike to 300, Snap Punch to 250, Twin Snakes to 280, Demolish to 70, Dragon Kick to 320, The Forbidden Chakra to 340, and Six-sided Star to 550.
Class_Trait_Desc_Steel Peak Mastery: Upgrades Steel Peak to The Forbidden Chakra.
Class_Trait_Desc_Tornado Kick Mastery: Upgrades Tornado Kick to Phantom Rush.
